Section.Catchline: Inspection of regulated metals property and records.

SectionBody.Text: During the usual and customary business hours of a secondary metals recycler, a law enforcement officer shall, after properly identifying herself or himself as a law enforcement officer, have the right to inspect:

Subsection.Text: Any and all purchased regulated metals property in the possession of the secondary metals recycler, and
Any and all records required to be maintained under s. 538.19.
